name: Sahaj Kaur
what_you_do: The TED Audio Collective is a collection of podcasts that explore a variety of topics including psychology, design, science, and technology, aimed at listeners who are curious about today's most exciting ideas.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes curious listeners interested in a wide range of topics, from psychology and design to science and technology, appealing to both general audiences and podcast enthusiasts.

jv_history.source_quote: li joins us to talk about her new book, “But What Will People Say?” that chronicles her journey and provides practical advice for navigating mental health. Guests: Sahaj Kohli, therapist; writer;
